body_html: @Danielyijun this may be better question for stackoverflow as the situation you are describing is a common situation which is not caused by a bug. IE, it happens when your model places bulk of parameters on first ps shard, and nothing being placed on remaining shards. The solution is to make sure you have enough variables and they are roughly equally balanced.

body: @Danielyijun this may be better question for stackoverflow as the situation you are describing is a common situation which is not caused by a bug. IE, it happens when your model places bulk of parameters on first ps shard, and nothing being placed on remaining shards. The solution is to make sure you have enough variables and they are roughly equally balanced.
